summary: A heartwarming tale about a beloved father who is trying to cope with cultural clashes, loss and the search for love in average Swedish society.
cast: Jan Fares|Torkel Petersson|Hamadi Khemiri|Nina Zanjani|Juan Rodríguez|Anita Wall|Jessica Forsberg|Kjell Wilhelmsen|Yankai Yu|Marie Delleskog|Deborah Fronko|Marisol Hume Eriksson|Pia Edlund|Jerker Fahlström|Lena Carlsson|Agnes Kim Chi Cortese|Lars Söderman|Helén Söderqvist Henriksson|Johan Kaliff|Mathias Gullbrandson|Jan Fredriksson|Lise-Lotte Fälthammar|Helen Klang|Lena Trulson|Beatrice Säresand|Snow Angel|Inka
title: Farsan
